product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThe POREfessional Matte Pore Minimizing Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingBenefit's lightweight Primer does it all: blurs the look of pores, helps makeup stay put, and instantly absorbs excess oil for a lasting natural-matte finish. Thanks to some star ingredients, the more you use it, the better your skin looks. Mattified AND damn good skin? Better get used to it.
details: DetailsBenefitsBlurs poresVisibly refines poresGood for oily skinNon-comedogenicTranslucentNatural-matte finishKey IngredientsNiacinamide, a form of Vitamin B3, contributes to skin hydration and helps smooth the look of poresRose Hip Extract helps reduce excess surface skin oil and shineMineral Powder softly blurs the look of poresResearch Results12-hour pore-refining*Item 2628402How To UseSmooth all over face with fingertips.Use alone or under makeup.IngredientsAqua (Water), Dimethicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Boron Nitride, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Isononyl Isononanoate, Sodium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Isohexadecane, Parfum (Fragrance), Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Oleate, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth all over face with fingertips.Use alone or under makeup.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product

reviews.headline: No never again so upset
reviews.comments: No! it's expensive! don't waste your money! Doesn't work! I wanted to try milk from here but now I won't. I bought from here because I was gifted a gift card and I needed a new primer. My go to is sealed from Sepho... Patrick Starr is next on my list

reviews.headline: THE BEST PRIMER
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: My new go to primer
reviews.comments: I have combination skin and i had been looking for a non oily primer and trued this and literally makes my makeup look like a flawless finish! Woukd rebuy this everytime! A must try!

reviews.headline: Ok
reviews.comments: This is an okay product. I usually buy the original pore minimizer and I like it much better. This product is a little runny and I'm not sure about it being a "matte" because I use foundation and powder over it.

reviews.headline: My new favorite!
reviews.comments: I have tried many different brands and  types of primers and brands over the years (Tula ,mac. Bare minerals etc). This had become my new favorite !! It Left my face feeling very soft and smooth. Great if you love for your face to feel moisturized before you apply makeup.

reviews.headline: Its perfect for blurring pores but dont get it in your eyes
reviews.comments: I used it and immediately noticed my pores blurred. Just dont get it in your eyes because the white part of your eyes will turn red and you'll see your blood vessels BUT I have to admit, after rinsing my eyes with water, it was perfect lol. I still use it every time I do my makeup

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I absolutely would recommend this. It is Matt and blurs everything perfectly. I use this under my powder foundation and I'm hooked.

reviews.headline: Not for me personally
reviews.comments: I had purchased this during 21DOB due to all the good reviews it had and i had just finished my porefessional one. I have very oily skin and i normally monitor how oily my face gets when i try a new primer. Normally it takes about 3-4 hours. This one only took one! I felt more oilier throughout the day than with any primer I've tried. The texture itself is nice, it just does not last with my skin.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't buy again for the price but I would say 7/10!
reviews.comments: Doesn't do much for oily skin!

reviews.headline: too thick
reviews.comments: I felt I had to use WAY too much of the product to cover my face. It's thick and tacky and doesn't apply evenly.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: My nose still loses its foundation. This works no better then Mac Mattifine shine control.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I hate to give reviews for foundation or primers as I have problematic skin. It did sink in quite well and quickly, but didn't keep my face Matte. I don't think it's because of the product, but my extremely horrible congested skin.

reviews.headline: Makes me oily
reviews.comments: I use regular primers that leaves my face looking nice by the end of the day. this one made me look like a grease ball.

reviews.headline: Don't see a  difference
reviews.comments: I don't see a difference in my skin or circles under my eyes.

reviews.headline: Id buy this product no matter what price. It's that good
reviews.comments: Literally so good !!!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: This is really good I tried a sample and I was impressed

reviews.headline: Just not for me
reviews.comments: I have really oily skin and within an hour my makeup creased and looked horrible.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This is a wonderful product. Makes my skin look smooth and soft. I get many compliments of how  pretty my skin looks.

reviews.headline: Impressed
reviews.comments: I have incredibly oily skin. By the end of the day,  I am an oil slick. I have tried toners, gels, and various primers and foundation that claimed to be mattifying. With this, barely any oil by the end of the day. Just wish it had spf, but otherwise,  super pleased with this!!!

reviews.headline: Find something else.
reviews.comments: I ended up an absolute mess with this primer. Never experienced my makeup breaking like I did using this as a primer.

faceoff_positive.comments:
So this is not a miracle worker by any means it's not going to erase your pores magically if that's what you're hoping for but it does smell really good and it does make your make up much more Matt. I applied this before I put on my foundation, but after my moisturizer, let it dry. It has a very sticky feel which I was impressed by And it did help my make up stay on a lot of smoother. It gave me a little bit of poor camouflage if you will it definitely helped but my pores were still visible so it's not a miracle worker if you're expecting something to completely hide your pores I don't think you'll ever really find something. That's just impossible. Pores are hard to Hide, but this does help to keep your skin Matt and it does have that signature sent of the professional primers and sprays which I absolutely love. It's definitely worth a try modifying qualities. I put my make up on about 6:30 in the morning and by about 730 at night it still looked pretty good. It is translucent. It did not peel under my moisturizer like that so it did pretty well. I was overall very impressed. 

Gifted by Benefit Cosmetics!
faceoff_positive.headline: Worth a purchase!

faceoff_negative.comments: Gifted by benefit cosmetics but I'm really disappointed with The POREfessional Matte Face Primer from Benefit. No matter how I applied it or what other products I used, this primer always caused my makeup to pill up and look uneven. The texture would start balling up on my skin, which then transferred to my foundation, making my whole complexion look cakey and disrupted. This happened consistently, ruining the application and wear of my makeup every time. The mattifying and pore-blurring claims just didn't hold up for me at all. For the high price, I expected much better performance, but unfortunately this primer was a total miss. I won't be repurchasing and I can't recommend it, especially with the issues I experienced.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not it for me
